# Bikimar E-Commerce Project

## Project Overview
E-commerce platform for swimwear/bikinis with admin panel and WhatsApp integration.

## Features
- Admin panel for product management
- Image upload functionality
- Product ordering/sorting
- Public storefront
- WhatsApp purchase integration
- No shopping cart (direct to WhatsApp)

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14
- TypeScript
- MongoDB
- NextAuth
- Tailwind CSS
- Cloudinary for images

## Progress
- [x] Project initialization
- [ ] Database setup
- [ ] Admin panel
- [ ] Public store
- [ ] WhatsApp integration
